content:
Here is the list of files in Mathlib/Init/ with a line count of lines that are not empty and not #align:

329 Mathlib/Init/Logic.lean
329 Mathlib/Init/Algebra/Classes.lean
314 Mathlib/Init/Order/Defs.lean
180 Mathlib/Init/Data/Nat/Lemmas.lean
166 Mathlib/Init/Set.lean
157 Mathlib/Init/Function.lean
145 Mathlib/Init/Control/Lawful.lean
115 Mathlib/Init/Order/LinearOrder.lean
89 Mathlib/Init/Align.lean
80 Mathlib/Init/Data/List/Lemmas.lean
71 Mathlib/Init/Data/Bool/Lemmas.lean
64 Mathlib/Init/Data/Int/Order.lean
56 Mathlib/Init/Data/Quot.lean
54 Mathlib/Init/Control/Combinators.lean
46 Mathlib/Init/Data/Ordering/Lemmas.lean
43 Mathlib/Init/Data/Sigma/Lex.lean
43 Mathlib/Init/Data/Ordering/Basic.lean
42 Mathlib/Init/Data/List/Basic.lean
41 Mathlib/Init/Core.lean
39 Mathlib/Init/ZeroOne.lean
38 Mathlib/Init/Quot.lean
34 Mathlib/Init/Data/List/Instances.lean
32 Mathlib/Init/Classical.lean
31 Mathlib/Init/Data/Nat/Basic.lean
27 Mathlib/Init/Data/Int/Basic.lean
27 Mathlib/Init/Data/Fin/Basic.lean
24 Mathlib/Init/Meta/WellFoundedTactics.lean
24 Mathlib/Init/Data/Sigma/Basic.lean
24 Mathlib/Init/Data/Nat/GCD.lean
19 Mathlib/Init/Data/Bool/Basic.lean
18 Mathlib/Init/Data/Rat/Basic.lean
17 Mathlib/Init/Data/Prod.lean
17 Mathlib/Init/Data/Option/Lemmas.lean
17 Mathlib/Init/Data/Nat/Div.lean
17 Mathlib/Init/Classes/Order.lean
16 Mathlib/Init/Data/Option/Init/Lemmas.lean
16 Mathlib/Init/Data/Option/Basic.lean
16 Mathlib/Init/Data/Nat/Notation.lean
16 Mathlib/Init/Data/Int/Lemmas.lean
16 Mathlib/Init/Data/Int/DivMod.lean
9 Mathlib/Init/Data/Buffer/Parser.lean
*/Data/Nat/Lemmas contains docs#Nat.discriminate. Is there any use in keeping such a decl around? We never use it anywhere in mathlib, and cases n covers this completely.
#14747 moves docs#Nat.find + API out of Init into a new file.
I'm pretty sure I have had a pr to do that open for a while

We have file#Mathlib/Data/Set/Defs.lean and file#Mathlib/Init/Set.lean.
I propose renaming the first to Mathlib/Data/Set/Operations.lean so that the second can be moved to Mathlib/Data/Set/Defs.lean.
Any thoughts on this?
I was thinking of renaming the first to Data.Set.Init
We use operations in other places (like Ideal/Operations). Do you strongly prefer Init?
Operations implies something that's more advanced in the import hierarchy than we mean, I would think
Why? It's just setting up basic operations on sets.

Ruben Van de Velde said:

I'm pretty sure I have had a pr to do that open for a while

For reference, this is #11891.
